comment: I found that that most of my essays were graded well, and was expecting a B or an A. Then I had submitted another essay that was pretty much the exact same quality  and he didn't receive it very well, and failed it claiming it wasn't what he wanted. I think it was because it didn't morally align with him because he's painfully woke. Boring class.

He's an amazing professor and is super caring. The homework is super easy as well as the essays.There are literally no "tests" as the only major things we have to do are the essays, which isn't many by the way.

Very laid-back professor. He comes to class, tells you what u need to do, and then lets you out early. I was very nervous about the essays since I hate typing papers but I have gotten all A's so far. Very simple class, I would take it again. And he also lets you finish any missing work to get a grade and not take 0's.
One of the easiest classes I've ever taken. Professor Owen is extremely nice and caring and will work with you to make sure you make an A. highly recommend. Interesting and great proffessor.

Professor Owen is great. You are graded on 4 essay's which he grades pretty fairly and weekly discussion post. You will need the textbooks to complete the post. Owen's lectures are short and simple and usually lets us out early. He is quick to respond to emails as well. I highly recommend him.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Graded by few things--Caring

comment: Professor Own is overall a good professor. He is very monotone which makes the class even more boring but the class is super easy. You have a few papers but no tests. Attendance is mandatory so you need to go in order to get an A. He is also a very lenient grader. So if you are someone who struggles with writing, then he is the professor for you.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: Mr. Owen was a wonderful English professor. Just participate in class and do the readings and you will do fine! His grading criteria for each essay is clearly laid out for you on D2L. It's very hard for you to fail an essay if you follow the rubric.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Caring

comment: Mr. Owen was awesome. I hate English classes but he managed to make it interesting. Will try to take him again for 1102.
Great professor! If you want a laid-back professor then he's the guy. He's very lenient on grading. Easy A.

Mr. Owen is a fantastic choice for a English teacher. He grades tough, but fair and with a lot of feedback, which is extremely helpful. He makes himself readily available outside of class, and always thoroughly answers any questions you might have in detail. He does lecture a lot, and if you skip a lot you won't pass b/c English Dept. regulations.
